Uses of Class
model.Model

  • Packages that use Model 
    Package Description
    main
    The main package for the GizmoBall Application where everything starts
    model
    The model package for the Gizmoball application The model holds the current state of the game and is responsible for updating its state during play
    view
    The view package for the GizmoBall Application This package contains the view portion of the application

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) Board FileManager.load(Model m, java.io.File file)
      Loads the given file and returns the playable board, while setting up the model for gameplay.

      Save out the given model to the given file
